relatedBlades.title: Privacy & data protection
relatedBlades.subtitle: Helping to build a more private Internet
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare builds privacy and data protection into everything we do. Explore our privacy policies, discover our privacy-focused products, and learn how we support regulatory requirements like the GDPR.

relatedBlades.title: GDPR compliance
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's policies around personal information align strongly with the GDPR's requirements. Learn how we work with European organizations to protect their users' data.

relatedBlades.title: HIPAA compliance
relatedBlades.copy: Leading healthcare organizations use Cloudflare to protect user and patient data. Learn how our services aligns to HIPAA compliance needs.

relatedBlades.title: Privacy policy
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare keeps your personal information personal and private, and is transparent about how we collect and use data. Explore our policies in detail.

relatedBlades.quote: The partnership with Cloudflare helps us to raise the bar of security standards for women's health apps, which is absolutely essential for our category.

resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare's policies around data privacy and law enforcement requests
resourceList.description: This paper outlines policies and procedures that guide how we manage customer and end-user data on our systems  and how we address government and other legal requests for data.

resourceMedia.description: This white paper describes how data travels on the Cloudflare network, data collection and privacy, and our protection of encryption keys.

resourceList.title: How Cloudflare Helps Address Data Locality and Privacy Obligations in Europe.
resourceList.resourceTitle: How Cloudflare Helps Address Data Locality and Privacy Obligations in Europe.
resourceList.description: Learn about Cloudflare's privacy commitments, our long history of working with European companies, and how our services help organizations meet their data protection needs.
